thread.title: Ciara Announces New Tour Dates In Nov & Dec
thread.title_full: Ciara Announces New Tour Dates In Nov & Dec - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Ciara Announces New Tour Dates In Nov & Dec
text:
The Fame Factory Entertainment
Tickets on Sale Beginning October 9
LOS ANGELES , Oct. 8, Grammy Award Winner Ciara announces the second leg of her North American Jackie Tour sponsored by TOPSHOP. Ciara has been named a U.S. Ambassador for the international fashion retailer. The next leg of the Jackie Tour will begin in her hometown Atlanta on Nov 27 and end in Southern California on Dec 20. Full listing of the Jackie Tour dates follow.
The first leg of the Jackie Tour, which coincided with the release of her new album, "Jackie," sold-out in 18 cities and received rave reviews including The New York Times heralding her "...body and heart working as one" and the Boston Globe stated that Ciara "...thrilled the hyper crowd."
The Jackie Tour marks Ciara's first live concert tour in over six years. The "Jackie" album on Epic/Sony Music Entertainment has already produced two hit singles, "I Bet" & "Dance Like We're Making Love."
For exclusive Jackie Tour VIP Packages, please visit: VIPNation.com.
VIP Packages include a meet & greet with Ciara, an individual photo op, special Q&A session, exclusive merchandise and more. Also, Delta SkyMiles members can use miles to bid on exclusive packages, including meeting Ciara backstage, via skymilesexperiences.com.
Ciara's first concert date of the tour will be exclusively live streamed through the Live Nation Channel on Yahoo! Friday, Nov 27 live from Atlanta , GA. Ciara's live streamed performance can be watched through the Yahoo! Screen App on mobile (iOs & Android) and connected devices (Apple TV, Roku, Xbox), or on desktop at www.yahoo.com/live .
